data.name: A Webbing Journey Demo
data.detailed_description:
A Webbing Journey ğŸ•¸ï¸ ğŸŒ ğŸŒ´


Play as a cute little spider in a wholesome 3D puzzle platformer and go on a journey to explore a world consisting of unique and interesting islands to collect the most beautiful and exotic flowers to surprise your spider date.

ğŸ® Gameplay ğŸ®


The game focuses on a cozy, relaxing and wholesome gaming experience around exploration, quests and puzzle solving. In contrast to other 3D puzzle platformer games, you are able to climb like a real spider, defying gravity as you explore the game world upside down.

You will also use your spider abilities which include web building to build bridges for yourself and other NPCs, use your webs to transport physics-based objects through the game world to solve puzzles and quests and eventually learn the web swinging techniques to traverse the environment with maximum efficiency to reach new platforms.

No combat or killing will be involved and all challenges will emerge from the levels and puzzles in the game.

âš™ï¸ Game Mechanics âš™ï¸


ğŸ•¸ï¸ Climbing on all surfaces like a real spider (even upside down)
ğŸ•¸ï¸ Jumping
ğŸ•¸ï¸ Web building
ğŸ•¸ï¸ Web swinging like spider-man
ğŸ•¸ï¸ Manipulating objects with your web
ğŸ•¸ï¸ Physics based puzzles solved via clever web utilization

ğŸ“– Story ğŸ“–


You are about to go on a spider date and you want to surprise your significant other with a special gift, a bouquet of flowers. However, this bouquet should not be made up of ordinary flowers: it should only consist of the most beautiful and exotic flowers that exist. You travel around the world and visit all islands to collect as many flowers as you can find. Each island will challenge you in various ways to collect the unique flowers on them. After collecting enough flowers on each island you will reach the final island where you will meet your spider date.

Along your journey you will meet fellow spiders which teach you new abilities, like web building and swinging, and other insects and animals which have their own little stories and side-quests for you. Itâ€™s up to you to decide which side-quests you want to finish, but each of them will give you additional rewards or help you increase your spider abilities.

The amount of flowers you bring to your date will change how the final cutscene and ending of the game will turn out, with the best result being achieved by collecting all flowers.

data.short_description: A wholesome 3D puzzle platformer featuring a cute little spider. Travel through colorful and unique islands searching for flowers for your spider date. Use your spider abilities to explore, help others, solve puzzles and just have fun.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
